scripts.start: rm -rf deploy/build deploy/build.zip && forever start deploy/productionServer.js && webpack-dev-server
scripts.stop: kill -9 $(pgrep node) && kill -9 $(pgrep -f webpack) && forever stop deploy/productionServer.js
scripts.pro: rm -rf deploy/build deploy/build.zip && echo 'Processing application files...' && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p > /dev/null && echo 'Compiling application files...' && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --progress && zip -r deploy/build.zip deploy/build
